CustomField.description: This states the environment that the value applies to. This enables us to specify different environments for the same parameter name (e.g. product object id on full sandbox = x, product object id on live = y). The parameter 'Environment' determines which environment we are running on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify which environment your parameter applies to. If it is the same across all environments then use 'Same for All'
CustomField.label: Environment
